column5: managed to get out to the lake today for a day of pikin'   all alone for the 1st hour before my buddy rob showed up, i had iced one small snot rocket early and not a bit again for almost an hour.  i drilled 2 new holes and set up some lines as i saw rob walkin across the lake and winthin 10 mintues one hole was on fire we managed 7 fish out of it within 2 hours 3 pike 3 perch and one Largemouth to my suprise. the biggest pike being just over 5 pounds and measurig in at 28 inches, and the biggest perch at 14 oz. and 12.5 inches it turned out to be a good day. not too cold at -10 and lots of snow coming down.   we kept the biggest perch and let the rest go,  Matt!
Looks like it was a super day out there for you.  That perch is huge  Joey
thanks dan, still early yet.  Thanks joey she was tasty too!  not a PB but gettin close!
you'll never starve there!  Well  done!
great couple of hrs. for you guys.  not just gettin' bit ,,but hookin' into some really nice lookin' fish!  well done matt !
They sure were perty BigUgli  Nope wouldnt have starved had i kept them all!  We didnt miss a fish all day Bob even the perch were takin in a 2/0 hook and a 4 inch minnow!

Great report and pics Matt  Nice mix bag of fish you guys caught.... congratulations With mild temps and active fish.... just doesn't get any better than that Thanks for sharing and keep them reports coming Jacques

Thats the plan Jaques, get out as much as i can for whatever feels like biting.  big small it dont matter the company is good and always a bit of exercise gettin out on the hard stuff. i'll keep my reports comin if u keeps yours comin too! hows that sound? hahah  Matt!
That sounds real good     Going out this Saturday for whities..... Hopefully will get my first
nice report Matt and way to help the team out too!  Cheers.

Definetly was a surprising day, but very successful. Weather co-operated and so did the fish, i dunno what is under that one hole but wrong word, shes a hot spot forsure, cant wait to check it in spring with the depth finder. That way we can know exactly what it is we were sittin on. Good times.
that looks like some great fishing,funny how that happenes some times when one of the holes gets most of the fish.
Great report and pics. Way to go. Monster perch, wow!
